title: Google Japan's Keyboard with a Möbius Strip Form Factor
description: Remember Google Japan's bizarre single-row keyboard?Those pranksters are at it again, this time creating a keyboard with a Möbius strip form factor:"Our continuous efforts to develop the keyboard have always focused on surface level problems," the engineering team write. "But what if we need a keyboard with a twist, one that turns the problem space outside-in?"The engineers' sense of humor is convincingly deadpan, my favorite is the guy with the donut:"We will continue our endless research and development to realize an even more comfortable input method. Thank you for your continued support this year."
author: Rain Noe

html:
Google Japan's Keyboard with a Möbius Strip Form Factor

Remember Google Japan's bizarre single-row keyboard?

Those pranksters are at it again, this time creating a keyboard with a Möbius strip form factor:


"Our continuous efforts to develop the keyboard have always focused on surface level problems," the engineering team write. "But what if we need a keyboard with a twist, one that turns the problem space outside-in?"

The engineers' sense of humor is convincingly deadpan, my favorite is the guy with the donut:

Enter a caption (optional)

"We will continue our endless research and development to realize an even more comfortable input method. Thank you for your continued support this year."
